item.title: [afr] A-Cloister Gargoyle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gargoyle

When Cloister Gargoyle enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

As long as you've completed a dungeon, Cloister Gargoyle gets +3/+0 and has flying.

item.title: [afr] A-Ellywick Tumblestrum
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ellywick

+1: Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

−2: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If it's legendary, you gain 3 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

−6: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have trample and haste and get +2/+2 for each differently named dungeon you've completed."

item.title: [afr] A-Dungeon Descent
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Tap an untapped legendary creature you control: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [afr] A-Fates' Reversal
item.description:
Sorcery

Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

item.title: [afr] A-Find the Path
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

When Find the Path enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon.

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any color."

item.title: [afr] A-Triumphant Adventurer
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Deathtouch

As long as it's your turn, Triumphant Adventurer has first strike.

Whenever Triumphant Adventurer attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

item.title: [afr] A-Precipitous Drop
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Precipitous Drop enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. It gets -5/-5 instead as long as you've completed a dungeon.

item.title: [stx] A-Divide by Zero
item.description:
Instant

Return target spell or permanent with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand.

If its mana value was 4 or less, learn.

item.title: [vow] A-Hullbreaker Horror
item.description:
Creature — Kraken Horror

Flash

Whenever you cast a spell, choose up to one —

• Return target spell you don't control to its owner's hand.

• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

item.title: [mid] A-Lier, Disciple of the Drowned
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Spells can't be countered.

As long as it's your turn, each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to that card's mana cost.

item.title: [war] A-Teferi, Time Raveler
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Teferi

Your opponents can't cast spells during your turn.

+1: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.

−3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

item.title: [afr] A-Acererak the Archlich
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Wizard

When Acererak the Archlich enters the battlefield, if you haven't completed Tomb of Annihilation, return Acererak the Archlich to its owner's hand and venture into the dungeon.

Whenever Acererak the Archlich attacks create a number of 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.

item.title: [sld] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [sld] Persistent Petitioners
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

{1}, {T}: Target player mills a card.

Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards.

A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

item.title: [sld] Command Tower
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [sld] Spore Frog
item.description:
Creature — Frog

Sacrifice Spore Frog: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

item.title: [sld] Swamp
item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

https://twitter.com/MTGSecretLair/status/1478411082356203523

item.title: [sld] Fblthp, the Lost
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Homunculus

When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead.

When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

item.title: [sld] Spellskite
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Horror

{U/P}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

item.title: [sld] Sphere of Safety
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.

item.title: [sld] Wrexial, the Risen Deep
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Kraken

Islandwalk, swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island or a Swamp.)

Whenever Wrexial, the Risen Deep deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [sld] Persistent Petitioners
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

{1}, {T}: Target player mills a card.

Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards.

A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

item.title: [sld] Darksteel Citadel
item.description:
Artifact Land

Indestructible

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [neo] Satoru Umezawa
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Ninja

Whenever you activate a ninjutsu ability, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Each creature card in your hand has ninjutsu {2}{U}{B}.

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1474425391418904594

item.description:

item.title: [pmei] Disenchant
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

https://twitter.com/mtgjp/status/1472850517718147073

item.title: [neo] Kaito Shizuki
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Kaito

At the beginning of your end step, if Kaito Shizuki entered the battlefield this turn, he phases out.

+1: Draw a card. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

−2: Create a 1/1 blue Ninja creature token with "This creature can't be blocked."

−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, search your library for a blue or black creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/electrifying-first-look-kamigawa-neon-dynasty-2021-12-16

item.title: [neo] Kaito Shizuki
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Kaito

At the beginning of your end step, if Kaito Shizuki entered the battlefield this turn, he phases out.

+1: Draw a card. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

−2: Create a 2/2 blue Ninja creature token with "This creature can't be blocked."

−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, search your library for a blue or black creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/electrifying-first-look-kamigawa-neon-dynasty-2021-12-16

item.title: [neo] Atsushi, the Blazing Sky
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon Spirit

Flying, trample

When Atsushi, the Blazing Sky dies, choose one —

• Exile up to two cards from your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

• Create three Treasure tokens.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/electrifying-first-look-kamigawa-neon-dynasty-2021-12-16

item.title: [neo] Hidetsugu, Devouring Chaos
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ogre Demon

{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 2.

{2}{R}, {T}, Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. When you exile a nonland card this way, Hidetsugu, Devouring Chaos deals damage equal to the exiled card's mana value to any target.

item.title: [pw22] Fateful Absence
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller investigates. (They create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [pw22] Consider
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

Draw a card.
